title: Hurricane circuit
brief_description: Shows how the warning centre at Miami, Florida, reduces hurrican menace in the Caribbean and the Gulf of Mexico. The operation of the warning system, precautions against damage, rescue and relief measures, and international aspects of the warning system. The nature of hurricanes is shown by animation.
